about: The whereabouts of the Y13 batch of IIT Kanpur. Inspired by (www.cs.cmu.edu/~mahim/class2001/) and (http://sid17.github.io/iitky12/#/). Originally developed by seniors from Y12(http://sid17.github.io/iitky12/#/contact).
working: Use http://bit.ly/y13iitk to fill your whereabouts. To update information please go to the same link again and 'edit your response'. This would require sign-in with same Gmail id which was used while filling the form.
